targets.query: SELECT COUNT("command") FROM "cron_error_log" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'docker-telegraf' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT count("active") FROM "nginx" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'docker-telegraf' AND "customer"::tag = 'testcustomer' AND "os"::tag = 'Linux' AND "port"::tag = '80') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "port"::tag fill(null)

SELECT sum("active") 
FROM "nginx" 
WHERE "host" = 'docker-telegraf' 
  AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' 
  AND "os" = 'Linux' 
  AND "port" = '80' 
  AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'docker-telegraf' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT sum("requests") 
FROM "nginx" 
WHERE "host" = 'docker-telegraf' 
  AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' 
  AND "os" = 'Linux' 
  AND "port" = '80' 
  AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'docker-telegraf' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'docker-telegraf' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'docker-telegraf' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'docker-telegraf' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") FROM "win_mem" WHERE ("customer" = 'testcustomer') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(linear)
SELECT "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'WSL-debian' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev' AND "path" = '/mnt/c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"::tag
SELECT "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'WSL-debian' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev' AND "path" = '/mnt/c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"::tag

SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'Ubuntu' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(linear)
SELECT "available" FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'Ubuntu' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'Ubuntu' AND "customer" = 'testcustomer' AND "os" = 'Linux' AND "environment" = 'Dev' AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"::tag
SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") FROM "win_mem" WHERE ("customer" = 'testcustomer') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(linear)
